files.patch:
@@ -123,0 +123,13 @@ + /** + * The access flag {@code ACC_SUPER} with a mask value of {@code + * 0x0020}. + *

+ * NOTE: The Valhalla draft JVMS spec does not define a value for ACC_SUPER. + * Historically, the value 0x0020 was used to indicate ACC_SUPER, which affected the + * semantics of any invokespecial instructions (6.5.invokespecial) appearing in the class. + * In Java SE 8, the ACC_SUPER semantics became mandatory, regardless of the setting of + * ACC_SUPER or the class file version number, and the flag no longer had any effect. + * Now the flag has been repurposed as ACC_IDENTITY. + */ + SUPER(0x0000_0020, false, Set.of(Location.CLASS)), +
